cast.name: 奥利弗·普帕特 Oliver Pupart
波普·卡姆加塞姆 Pop Khamgasem
卡约沙克·拉塔那尼塞 Kajornsak Rattananissai
琵姆普莱帕·唐普莱坡恩 Pimprapa Tangprabhaporn

introduction: Watit and Ruth are twins raised apart.  Watit grows up in the city, in a rich comfortable environment while his older twin, Ruth leads a modest but comfortable life in the country.  When Watit gets hurt and goes into a coma, his father asks Ruth to pretend to be Watit in order to catch the culprit. Metinee got engaged to Watit as part of a business arrangement; although Watit loves Metinee, she does not return his affections. However, when Ruth comes pretending to be Watit, Metinee slowly starts to notice the differences and falls for Ruth.
